author: Veronika Kero
title: This tool will replace your unkempt background during conference calls
description: TL;DR: Get a lifetime subscription to XSplit VCam for just $19.99, a 59% savings as of March 29. If you're navigating the transition from an actual office to your home, you're not alone. Consider yourself one of the lucky ones and try to make the most of the …
content:
